name: ZombiesVsZombies
description:
Game made by Esmé & Wilfried during a friendly weekend GameJam. The theme was asset draft : each person brings 4 free assets and each team of 2 then picks 8 (6 of which they have to use)

Assets used :

Gibberish dialogue https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/voices/gibberish-dialogue-voice-pack-volume-1-32787 

 Mano A Mano - Music https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/?stay#!/content/3289 

 ZombieModel https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/zombie-30232 

 Cartoon FX Free https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-free-109565 

Ez Camera shake https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/camera/ez-camera-shake-33148 

 Low Poly Zombie https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/character-pack-zombie-sample-131604

Wildcard Asset 

Zombie Font https://www.dafont.com/fr/zombie.font
